title: HELP I cant seem to be able to buy runes!!!
body: Help I cant buy runes I have 17k ip and everytime I try to buy new runes it tells me error that I already have it but I dont its been happening for a while what should I do?

replies.body: Is this when you try to buy *any rune* or is it a specific rune?
Any rune I can buy a mastery page but no runes it keeps saying I own it but I dont.

It looks like you may have some old runes still around. I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can sort this out for good together.

Let me know if this caused any changes.
Any rune I can buy a mastery page but no runes it keeps saying I own it but I dont.
